# <a name="search-mail-and-people-on-outlook-on-the-web"></a><span data-ttu-id="f465e-102">搜尋郵件和網頁型 Outlook 的人</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f465e-102">Search Mail and People on Outlook on the Web</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="f465e-103">在命令輸出的</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f465e-103">In the</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAAABUAAAAVBAMAAABbObilAAAAKlBMVEX///+WqL7l6u8vUn8iR3azwNDCzNlObJFAYIkDLWNeeZuks8d7ka1thaRtSbf+AAAAS0lEQVQI12MgFjAdmVkKY6csYxK5AGUbAqWsIUzGBiARAmGzCwAJlgQwmyMARiDEEeoxzWEyQZivLAS3l8kQ4RplkDF4hRkWEvQSABbdDSdqA/J0AAAAAElFTkSuQmCC' />
 <span data-ttu-id="f465e-104">[] 頁面頂端的**搜尋**方塊輸入您想要搜尋 （連絡人、 電子郵件主旨或郵件的一部分），並按 Enter 鍵。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f465e-104">**Search** box at the top of the page, type what you want to search for (a contact, email subject, or part of a message) and press Enter.</span></span>

2. <span data-ttu-id="f465e-105">當您完成的搜尋，請選取後的箭號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f465e-105">When you're done with the search, select the back arrow</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="f465e-106">在**搜尋**] 方塊中，或以結束搜尋] 的左窗格中選取任何資料夾。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f465e-106">in the **Search** box or select any folder in the left pane to exit the search.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f465e-107">如需詳細資訊，請閱讀[搜尋郵件和網頁型 Outlook 中的人員](https://support.office.com/article/b27e5eb7-3255-4c61-bf16-1c6a16bc2e6b)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f465e-107">For more information, read [Search Mail and People in Outlook on the web](https://support.office.com/article/b27e5eb7-3255-4c61-bf16-1c6a16bc2e6b).</span></span>
